Categories.search_parts_by_car_brand: Find parts for your car by brand. We offer a wide selection of original and aftermarket parts for various car brands.

Categories.airbag_components_seo_description: Wide selection of components for vehicle safety systems. We offer quality parts for repair and maintenance of airbags.

Categories.pyrotechnics_seo_description: Wide range of pyrotechnics for various vehicle safety systems. We offer quality pyrotechnic devices for seat belts, airbags, and other SRS components.

Categories.dashboard_pyrotechnics_description: Pyrotechnics for passenger airbag in dashboard with one or two igniters
Categories.connectors_seo_title: Connectors and Plugs for Airbag SRS Safety Systems
Categories.connectors_seo_description: Wide selection of connectors and plugs for vehicle safety systems. Quality connectors for airbags and other SRS components.
Categories.mounts_seo_title: Mounts for Airbag SRS Safety Systems

Categories.resistors_seo_description: Resistors for diagnostics and airbag simulation. Quality simulators for vehicle safety systems.

Categories.pyro_seats_seo_description: Pyrotechnics for driver and passenger leg protection, as well as seat pyrotechnics. Additional protection in emergency situations.

Categories.covers_seo_title: Covers and Overlays for Safety Systems

PrivacyPolicy.metaDescription: AirBag website privacy policy. Information about the collection, use and protection of your personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: We value your trust and strive to protect your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it and store it.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.description: We may collect the following data:

items.item5: Telegram ID (in case of interaction through Telegram bot)
items.item6: Google account data (when using Google login)
items.item7: Other data necessary for order processing

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.description: We use the received data for:

items.item2: Communication with you regarding your order
items.item4: Improving the service and website operation
items.item5: Authorization and personalization of your account

section3.title: 3. Google Authorization
section3.description1: If you choose to log in via Google, we will receive from Google only the data that you confirm during login (for example, name, email, profile photo).
section3.description2: We do not store or have access to your Google passwords.

section4.title: 4. Telegram ID
section4.description1: When interacting with our Telegram bot, we may store your Telegram ID for identification and communication purposes.
section4.description2: This data is not shared with third parties, except in cases provided by law.

section5.title: 5. Information Protection
section5.description: We take all necessary technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification or deletion.

section6.title: 6. Third Party Disclosure
section6.description: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in cases where it is necessary to fulfill an order (delivery services, payment services) or provided by Ukrainian legislation.

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.description: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

Terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using the AirBag website. Information about ordering, payment, delivery and product returns.
Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.subtitle: Welcome to our online store! Please carefully read the terms and conditions of using the site before placing an order.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.description1: 1.1. By using our website, you agree to these terms and conditions.
section1.description2: 1.2. The administration reserves the right to change the terms without prior notice.
section1.description3: 1.3. Updated terms are published on this page.

section2.title: 2. Order Placement
section2.description1: 2.1. Orders can be placed through the website or Telegram bot.
section2.description2: 2.2. Valid contact information must be provided to confirm the order.
section2.description3: 2.3. We reserve the right to contact you to clarify details.

section3.title: 3. Payment and Delivery
section3.description1: 3.1. Payment is made according to the terms available on the website.
section3.description2: 3.2. Delivery is carried out by Nova Poshta within 1-3 business days after order confirmation.
section3.description3: 3.3. Delivery costs are paid by the customer according to the carrier's rates.

section4.title: 4. Returns and Exchanges
section4.description1: 4.1. Returns or exchanges are possible within 14 days from the receipt of the goods, if they have not been used and are preserved in their original condition.
section4.description2: 4.2. Delivery costs for returns/exchanges are paid by the buyer, except in cases of defects or our mistake.
section4.description3: 4.3. To arrange a return, please contact our support service.

section5.title: 5. Liability of the Parties
section5.description: 5.1. The seller is not responsible for:

items.item1: delivery delays due to the carrier;
items.item2: incorrect data provided by the buyer when placing an order;
items.item3: damage to goods caused by the delivery service.

section6.title: 6. Personal Data
section6.description1: 6.1. All personal data is processed in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
section6.description2: 6.2. By using the site, you agree to the processing of your data for the purpose of order processing and delivery.
